action_item: Users & Roles - Personalize the application settings to improve user experience.
notes: Focus on User Appearance tab for landing page, inbox cleanup, and accessibility features.

action_item: Users & Roles - Change the main login password for security.
notes: Use the Change Password option in the settings tab.

action_item: Users & Roles - Update the eSignature ID for added security.
notes: Follow the two-step process to validate and change the eSignature ID.

action_item: Users & Roles - Update the visual signature for documents.
notes: Validate with eSignature ID before drawing a new signature.

action_item: Reports - Customize clinical document templates for patient summaries.
notes: Select and order sections like allergies, medications, and lab results in CCDA format.
